tool_description: Xotelo is a simple and lightweight API for gettings hotel rates.
name: Xotelo - Hotel Prices
title: Xotelo - Hotel Prices

api_list.name: /api/rates

required_parameters.name: chk_in
required_parameters.description: Check-In date. (Format YYYY-MM-DD ex. 2019-05-31 for 31 May 2019)

required_parameters.name: chk_out
required_parameters.description: Check-Out date. (Format YYYY-MM-DD ex. 2019-05-31 for 31 May 2019)

required_parameters.name: hotel_key
required_parameters.description: A unique key assigned to each Hotel used to matching with TripAdvisor. [How to get Hotel Key](https://xotelo.com/how-to-get-hotel-key.html)

optional_parameters.name: age_of_children
optional_parameters.description:
Age of children, separate by comma (,).  Ex: [0,4,7] for 3 children)
- If age is 0-1 years old, should put 0
- Available age is between 0 to 17

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Refers to the three-letter currency code of a given currency (USD, GBP, EUR, CAD, CHF, AUD, JPY, CNY, INR, THB, BRL, HKD, RUB, BZD)
